title: 2025 Asia Cup

sections.heading: Lead
sections.text:
The 2025 Men's Asia Cup (also known as DP World Asia Cup for sponsorship reasons) was the 17th edition of the Asia Cup cricket tournament. It took place in the United Arab Emirates (UAE) from 9 to 28 September 2025. [ 1 ] The matches were played in the Twenty20 International (T20I) format. India was the defending champions of 2023 . [ 2 ]

The tournament featured eight teams. The five full members of the Asian Cricket Council, Afghanistan , Bangladesh , India , Pakistan , and Sri Lanka automatically qualified for the tournament and were joined by United Arab Emirates , Oman and Hong Kong , the teams which finished in the top three in the 2024 ACC Men's Premier Cup . In the final , India defeated Pakistan by 5 wickets to win their ninth title, and thus retained the title. [ 3 ] [ 4 ]

categories: September 2025 sports events in the United Arab Emirates
